OCD.name: Spoofer
OCD.description: This a configuration page for spoofing RSSI values of between nodes 0-4. It can be assumed that node 0 is this kura instance

AD.name: CloudPublisher Target Filter
AD.description: Specifies, as an OSGi target filter, the pid of the Cloud Publisher used to publish messages to the cloud platform.

AD.name: publish.rate
AD.description: Default message publishing rate in seconds (min 1).
